did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, photographs, videotapes, technical drawings, academic papers, books, certificates
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Personal and Professional papers and correspondence relating to his work at Newman Laboratory and in the Physics Department, especially files relating to the Cornell Electron Storage Ring (CESR) and the Superconducting Supercollider (SSC). Also includes information about Robert Wilson and his memorial service.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Professional papers and correspondence relating to his work at Newman Laboratory and in the Physics Department, especially files relating to the Cornell Electron Storage Ring (CESR) and the Superconducting Supercollider (SSC). Also includes information about Robert Wilson and his memorial service.
Personal papers, including diplomas and certificated; photographs; files about his retirement celebration; obituaries and memorial statements; and clippings.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Box 12-14: restricted to permission of the Archivist

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Boyce D. McDaniel papers, #14-22-3242. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
